The principles of the true Christian religion breifelie selected, out of manie good bookes. first reade: and then iudge. Butterfield, Swithun, d. 1611.
[96] p.
[By T. Dawson] for Iohn Hill: dwelling in Pater Noster rowe, at the signe of the golden Eagle, and the childe], [Imprinted at London : 1590.
Imprint from colophon; printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-G (G8 blank). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
